schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts at lightning speed and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, a traffic accident occurred on the road between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: At 9.30 p.m. a 44-year-old motorist wanted to turn left with her VW coming from Merklingen onto Landesstraße 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: She overlooked the 24-year-old, right-of-way motorcyclist coming from Nellingen.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: Hand and foot brake levers fly away during the collision
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker tried to avoid the car, but nevertheless grazed it at the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: Due to the striking process, the hand and foot brake levers on the Suzuki were torn off and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: Mentally, he steered his motorcycle in the green stiffness next to the roadway and had it rolled out without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: Due to the collision with the car, the biker nevertheless suffered an injury and had to be treated in a clinic.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Corona mass infection: 174 harvesters infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: After a mass Corona infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are under quarantine and are no longer allowed to leave the farm.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service monitors the ban on going out.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvesters tested positive for the Corona pathogen Sars-CoV-2 during the series examination, as reported by the district office Dingolfing-Landau on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: In order to avoid further spread, we unfortunately have to take this step to protect the population, explained District Administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Previously, seven employees had already been infected in the company - this was the reason for the series test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The farm is a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - but the cucumbers are only for insertion jars.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with about 3300 inhabitants not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to the citizens to keep calm: "According to our information, this is a closed group of people."
np-coburg.de.105627.10: On the farm, infected people were separated from uninfected employees, and the site is now surrounded by a barrier fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Greens and SPD gave the state government a share of responsibility.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition factions accused Prime Minister Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting the control of the shelters of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: This can take bitter revenge if such local infections have to take hold and regional lockdowns have to be ordered, said Jürgen Mistol, the parliamentary managing director of the Green Party.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD takes a similar view: "Following the Corona outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May, we have already called for a special control programme for farms with harvesters," said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: From our point of view, it is precisely the hygiene conditions in the workplace and living conditions that need to be strictly controlled.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: Underground station Aidenbachstraße: Dangerous dispute: 19-year-old falls into the track bed after pushing
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: In a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station, a 19-year-old fell through a push and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - On Friday there was a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station at around 4.15 p.m.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passerby alerted the police, who arrived with several stripes.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to an initial investigation, a man from Munich (17) pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slid over the edge of the platform and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the 17-year-old's group helped the fallen man to climb out of the track.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger of an incoming train.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: According to the police, there were clashes between the two people afterwards.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old initially fled the scene, but his personal details could be determined afterwards.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: Accompanied by his father, he went to the police inspectorate 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is being investigated for assault.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer pushes for longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: According to a media report, however, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer is calling for an extension of the storage period.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer (CSU) is calling for extended data retention - instead of the planned ten weeks for half a year.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As the "Bild am Sonntag" reports, Seehofer Minister of Justice Christine Lambrecht (SPD) asked in a letter for a quick change in the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: Accordingly, Seehofer wants to step up measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He considers it useful to "make urgently needed adjustments to the law now," the newspaper quotes from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: The ECJ is expected to make a decision on this.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: Seehofer, however, wants the changes beforehand, so that they could be applied immediately after a possible positive judgment, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A spokesperson for the Ministry of Justice told the newspaper that it was only possible to examine whether legal adjustments were needed once the courts had ruled.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer, together with the interior ministers of the federal states, had already spoken out in June in favour of data retention.
bild.255016.1: NBA: Strip club trouble for Clippers star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), a professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Clippers, is said to have left the tournament headquarters in Disney World in Orlando / Florida with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to US media reports, he visited the strip club "Magic City" in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who is said to have admitted the visit according to ESPN data, is back in isloation and is being tested daily for Covid-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason for the visit: Chicken Wings.
bild.255016.7: In February last year "Sweet Lou," as he is called in the NBA, already expressed his love for exactly these wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote: "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta, editor's note) have the best wings in town."
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Twitter on Sunday that the NBA Williams had ordered a ten-day quarantine.
bild.255016.10: The Clippers star missed the first two official games after the test match phase.
bild.255016.11: In Disney World, the NBA wants to end the Corona season.
bild.255016.12: Currently, the best 22 teams with training games are preparing for the season finale starting on Friday night.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Söder comments on the Corona situation after a mass infection
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) has already announced a test offensive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference will be shown live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has startled authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvesters from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and more than a third have been infected with the Corona pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is cordoned off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: No one is allowed to leave the premises, food is delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering free Corona tests to the 3,300 residents of the municipality.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvesters had little contact with the local population, the district office previously assumed that the infections did not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: Remorse: Confession of the alleged arsonist of Nantes
kurier.at.204625.2: My client has shown himself to be cooperative, lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defense attorney added: "He greatly regrets the actions, the confession was a release for him."
kurier.at.204625.4: His mandate was "plagued by remorse and greatly affected by the extent of the destruction."
kurier.at.204625.5: According to the prosecutor's office, if convicted, the man faces ten years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic St. Peter's and Paul's Cathedral in Nantes was badly damaged in a fire on Saturday last week.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire broke out in three places far apart in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The now imprisoned suspect had already been arrested a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: He was released after one day.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the diocese of Nantes and was responsible for the closure of the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no trace of a violent intrusion into the church, he quickly came to the attention of the investigators.
infranken.de.309597.1: Discussing the abolition of the 50 + 1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB president Reinhard Grindel has recommended thinking about abolishing the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: German football should at least discuss setting conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli, Grindel told the "Bild am Sonntag."
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: "For the clubs that are most likely to be dangerous in Bavaria and Dortmund, the 50 + 1 rules do not work anyway: See Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, one cannot avoid the debate as to whether it is not necessary to make it easier for associations that want to break into this phalanx to involve investors. "
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he has doubts as to whether there is a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority shareholdings, which are prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: It remains a legal risk to draw investment fences around the Bundesliga as a business location in a European internal market, said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former head of the DFB sees the danger that "the attempts to create a more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will ultimately only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but will not lead to more excitement in the championship."
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an equal distribution of TV funds will not have a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: FC Bayern has a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund of 500 million and RB Leipzig of 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: So the differences are already immense among the first three clubs alone.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million, explained the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: Unfortunately, there have been people who have noticed this mistake and stabbed the press instead of talking to me about it, Grindel said about the acceptance of an expensive watch that led to his retirement in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: I was very preoccupied with that. "
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift worth about 11,000 euros from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: I committed a breach of compliance and it was right to draw conclusions from it, said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.18: I was completely transparent and unsuspecting about the ominous watch gift.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many people in the DFB knew about it. "
infranken.de.309597.20: He had never "made a secret of the gift," assured the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.21: This may be called naive, at least this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption. "
faz.79601.1: Black Lives Matter: Injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: Protests against police violence in the United States have come to a head again as a result of Donald Trump's deployment of federal police officers in several cities.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday there were clashes between demonstrators and police officers in various cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville and 16 people were arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, one person was killed by gunfire while a demonstration train was crossing an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Previously, clashes had occurred again in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including federal police officers, used tear gas on Saturday night and forcibly dispersed demonstrators.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of demonstrators, some of them armed, marched through Louisville in Kentucky on Saturday, demanding that those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be held responsible.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student was shot dead in March during a drug raid in her apartment in Louisville.
faz.79601.10: The target of the raid was someone else who did not live there, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: On Saturday, when a member of a group that describes itself as an armed alliance of black Americans fired a shot, three people were injured.
faz.79601.12: According to NBC, they were taken to the hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them were in danger of their lives.
faz.79601.14: The police set up barricades because counter-demonstrators from a white militia had formed.
faz.79601.15: In the end, there was no clash between the two groups.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, one person was shot and died during a "Black Lives Matter" demonstration.
faz.79601.17: According to the police, a suspect was taken into custody.
faz.79601.18: So far, she did not provide further information on the circumstances of the crime.
faz.79601.19: According to the New York Times, Mayor Steve Adler said he was, like many in the city, "inconsolable and stunned" by what had happened.
faz.79601.20: Demonstrators in the American metropolis of Seattle also clashed with the police on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to trailers in front of a juvenile prison, and the police used stun grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the Seattle Times, 16 people were arrested for resisting police officers or assault.
faz.79601.23: In the city of Oakland, California, a courthouse was set on fire.
faz.79601.24: A small group of protesters smashed windows, shot down fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, Oakland police said late on Saturday evening (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver in Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: According to the police, one of the protesters fired a gun and at least one person was taken to hospital injured.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were smashed in a court and a fire was set, according to the police.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: Historical costumes defy Corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although the big show in the spa town was missing, visitors and performers enjoyed the Rakoczy flair of the alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organizers: The Rakoczy weekend without a Rakoczy festival.
infranken.de.309607.4: But even if the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights such as Saale burning, Rakoczy ball or parade, many people got their money's worth with the Corona-compliant alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.5: I think we have succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair, says spa director Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: The guests had accepted it well.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, one returns to the beginnings of the Rakoczy festival, when only the historical ones were the focus of the festival.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konhäuser and her husband have been visiting Bad Kissingen for the Rakoczy festival for more than 25 years.
infranken.de.309607.10: This is also the case in the Corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold Casino, watching the historical while strolling and listening to the Cuban live music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: I think it's so pleasant, says Konhäuser.
infranken.de.309607.13: She does not miss the crowds that otherwise belong to Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: But it lacks the usual program highlights, especially Saale on Friday evening, as well as the historic parade and the closing fireworks display on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been a great fit this year, she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy equestrian tournament to take place again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historical spa guests, the alternative program sometimes meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example, for Christina Gold, who takes part in the parade in a normal year and can be seen on the carriage of the spa garden café.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year, on Saturdays and Sundays, she was walking around the city in costume.
infranken.de.309607.21: It's more strenuous, otherwise we'll have it easier, she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The riding club had less to do, even if individual riders were on the road in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: We very much hope that the equestrian quadrille will take place again next year, says chairwoman Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, a Rakoczy equestrian tournament will take place again in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 Corona cases with Spanish second division club Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish second division football club CF Fuenlabrada is sliding deeper and deeper into crisis due to a Corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from near Madrid, despite the first Corona cases, flew to the city of A Coruña for a game on July 20, one low blow follows the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had tested positive and one was hospitalized, according to the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name southwest of Madrid still had the chance to reach the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now there is even the threat of relegation to the B-Group of the Second League.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coruña last Monday was cancelled at the last moment, the prosecutor's office is investigating a possible crime against public health, the supreme sports authority CSD is considering the forced relegation of the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: The players and other team members are quarantined in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: Until the sixth day of the quarantine, they received no fresh towel and no gel, wrote the sports newspaper "AS."
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos show players hanging up underwear and club clothes in their rooms in the hotel to dry, after they apparently had to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: Also the bed linen was not changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: It is neither good nor sufficient, wrote "AS."
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, on the other hand, said they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas, rejected the accusation of intentionally endangering public health.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: According to the son of the president of the Spanish Primera Division, Javier Tebas, the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper "Marca" reported that they did not violate the Corona rules set by the football association.
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before departure, there were four people infected by July 19, but they were all isolated and did not travel with them.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Right before the flight to A Coruña on Monday, all players and team members were tested again.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Coruña, the Corona test was positive for "five or six" other team members.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The game was cancelled 60 minutes before kick-off, said Tebas Llanas.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police must catch torn-out horses at the steam compartment
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police led her back to her owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: On Sunday morning shortly before 6 o'clock a road user informed two free-running horses on the feeder between the junction Donnersdorf / Steinsfeld and the motorway junction Theres.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officials arrived, the horses were already back between the feeder and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: After the officials were able to win the trust of the horses shortly before the steam compartment, they each had a rope carried in the patrol car.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: Career sequel imaginable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is thinking about a continuation of his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt / Main - The seven-time time trial world champion Tony Martin can imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: The 35-year-old told the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung" (Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung) how and in what form the team could proceed.
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the Corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: The negotiations with his team are also about the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or other problems that would plague him as a family man, said Martin.
azonline.de.86610.8: He used to get up after a fall, and the first thought was: "Quickly back on the bike.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a young daughter, I think: What if. "
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist acknowledged that there are certainly aspects with which he is increasingly struggling.
azonline.de.86610.11: But it was good for me to realize from the Corona era what I have in cycling and how much I enjoyed it. "
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist returns to the competition at the Tour de l'Ain (5 to 9 August).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria's streets at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The fine weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the motorcycle tour ends fatally.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schönthal - Several people, mostly young, died in accidents on Bavaria's roads over the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: On Saturday, an 18-year-old female motorcyclist was hit by a car coming into the opposite lane near Schönthal (Cham district).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: Why the car got into the opposite lane was initially unclear.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: On Saturday in Upper Bavaria, a 22-year-old collided with a horse-drawn carriage on his plane.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he was on his way downhill at Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: In a left turn he crashed into the carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve passengers in the carriage, one man was seriously injured and one man was slightly injured, according to the police.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: In another fatal accident, an 18-year-old died in the Upper Palatinate town of Bad Kötzting.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He lay down on a road during the night of Sunday and was overrun by a 42-year-old driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to the police, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver was unable to brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: At Schönberg (district of Freyung-Grafenau) on Saturday a 57-year-old biker crashed head-on into a car in a right turn despite full braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.18: He died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock and the remaining three people in the car were uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria's Minister of Transport Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organizer of the biker protests announced for August against driving bans, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underrun protection on guardrails and the defusing of dangerous curves.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: In recent years, we have achieved a great deal for the safety of motorcyclists, the letter said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: The number of motorcyclists killed was reduced by around 28 percent compared to 2011. "
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt / Main (dpa) - For football coach Niko Kovac, his new club AS Monaco will soon be reunited with Eintracht Frankfurt.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champion will make a guest appearance on August 1 (6 p.m.) at Hesse, the former club of the Croatian.
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga club, this is the first and only endurance test before the return leg in the Europa League against FC Basel (6 August).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Because of the coronavirus pandemic, the encounter will be held without spectators.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: We are particularly looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It's always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends, explained Kovac.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: This is an interesting test in sporting terms, said the 48-year-old.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before joining FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached Hesse from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB-Pokal.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us with regard to the game against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like all Frankfurters, I am looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again, said Eintracht coach Adi Hütter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croat at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, the team from Frankfurt lost the round-of-16 first leg against Basel in their own stadium 3-0.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Nearly 50 new infections: Landkreis Hof just past the lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In the district of Hof, the number of known new Corona infections increased further over the weekend: From 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and is no longer included in this statistic) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: In addition, there is a case in the town of Hof.

euronews-de.199228.1: 700 killed by monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: The severe flooding in Southeast Asia has affected more than 9 million people, mainly in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: Due to the heavy monsoon rain, a total of 700 people were killed.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent is trying to reach the isolated people in boats.
euronews-de.199228.6: The farmers have lost their crops.
euronews-de.199228.7: Tank rhinos in national park die from landslides
euronews-de.199228.8: In Kaziranga National Park, several of the 120 tank rhinos were killed by landslides.
euronews-de.199228.9: They are under protection and are considered to be in danger of extinction.
euronews-de.199228.10: This year, the floods are particularly severe, which scientists attribute to climate change.
euronews-de.199228.11: According to the United Nations, Bangladesh is one of the countries most affected by global warming.
euronews-de.199228.13: In the village of Cox's Bazar in the south of Bangladesh, the state has built apartments for 650 people displaced by the floods.
euronews-de.199228.14: So far only a few have moved in.
euronews-de.199228.15: It is difficult to bring people to Cox's Bazaar.
euronews-de.199228.16: The enthusiasm is also maintained in Grenezn.
euronews-de.199228.17: Anyone who used to have a house, no matter how small it was and resembled a hut, often does not want to spend his life in a large block of flats.
euronews-de.199228.18: Many apartments are empty, but - the government wants it - will soon be occupied by those who have lost their homes due to the floods.

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be fulfilled, the Ministry of Economy in Buenos Aires announced on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: This would not only be irresponsible, but also unfair, it said in a statement.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors. "
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debt of the second largest economy in South America is no longer sustainable under current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: That is why Argentina is calling on its private creditors to waive some of their claims of about 66 billion US dollars (about 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country is once again threatened with bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth default in Argentine history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Most recently, lenders had demanded higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its last offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is experiencing a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate has recently been more than 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: For the current year, experts expect economic power to decline by around ten percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina failed to settle interest claims amounting to 503 million US dollars, resulting in a limited default.
pnp.de.390078.1: Arrived professionally - not yet in private
pnp.de.390078.2: It's going very well "- Dr. Stefanie Kramer draws this conclusion after her first days at the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything went very fast: In mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she would succeed Lutz Feller at the Eggenfelden notary's office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Just six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the lawyer, who holds a doctorate in law, started work, and normal day-to-day business has long been in full swing.
pnp.de.390078.5: Privately, however, I still have to arrive, she explains in conversation with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course, the short lead time was not enough to relocate the center of life from Regensburg completely to Eggenfelden, reports the native of Dingolfinger.
pnp.de.390078.7: She and her husband, who works as a judge at the district court in Regensburg, are currently looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband could still apply for parental leave at short notice in order to be able to guarantee the care of the two daughters (3 1 ⁄ 2 and 1 1 ⁄ 2 years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute every day from Regensburg, she also has an overnight stay with her parents in Dingolfing, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Growing up in the neighbouring district, the city of Eggenfelden has been known to her for a long time.
pnp.de.390078.11: During visits to the site with her family over the past few months, she realized again: "Eggenfelden is a really nice small town."
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she had made the race in the selection process for the vacancy.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her home country of Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal traineeship and the 2nd state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as a notary assessor, among others in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in Unterallgäu and Regensburg - during which time she also "incidentally" shouldered her doctorate in employment law - she took up her first position as a notary in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016, she went on parental leave, followed by moving to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then, she has taken over representative services in various notary offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised because of the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller, she saw the right time for full career re-entry, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: The team of her predecessor, who will take over the holiday representation at the notary's office in the future, has completely taken over Dr. Stefanie Kramer - and immediately has some praise for the firm's team: "It's going very well!"
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-rehearsed processes makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of the private centre of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: When it comes to kindergarten and nursery places, she has already contacted a local institution.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything goes as desired, she hopes to pursue her hobby here as soon as possible - and get to know the most beautiful jogging tracks in the Rottal valley.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to start the league with a maximum of 15,000 spectators
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The biggest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be 20 percent filled at the start of the season in the event of a fan return.
an-online.de.487062.3: Due to the distance regulation, which is mandatory, we are currently planning with 12,000 to 15,000 spectators, Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer told the "Tagesspiegel."
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the district city holds just over 81,000 spectators at Bundesliga matches.
an-online.de.487062.5: In last season's ghost games caused by the Corona pandemic, BVB lost around four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitisation and internationalisation at BVB, hopes that in addition to the normal audience seats, some of the approximately 4,000 seats in the hospitality area can be opened up again: "It goes without saying that it will be a blow to the office if this revenue breaks away completely."
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing Corona crisis, everyone is currently "well advised to take a stable side length."
an-online.de.487062.8: If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people in Germany alone are in short-time work, then the need for entertainment is limited, explained Cramer.
an-online.de.487062.9: The head of marketing in Dortmund praised the BVB professionals for their partial salary waiver, which should help to overcome the crisis: "Of course, the players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than if we put 100 people working in merchandising on short-time work."
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: Early start in life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a packet of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: That was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of about 400 premature babies who are cared for annually at the children's hospital in Graz.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extreme lightweights with a birth weight of less than one kilogram.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born so early that neither lungs, intestines, nor muscles are fully developed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so delicate that they could injure the electrodes of an ECG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that they sometimes wear doll's clothes and mini diapers made especially for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they wouldn't be in voice - "and how," smiles Berndt Urlesberger.
kurier.at.204565.9: Even if of course they don't scream as loud as big babies. "
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite the Corona theatre in the classroom: The whiteboard as a stage experienced the 9th grades of the Sankt-Jakobus-Gymnasium in Abtsgmünd shortly before the start of the holiday.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the Theater der Stadt Aalen presented the students with the production "Das Heimatkleid" (The Home Dress) via video.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: Afterwards, the pupils were able to discuss the play and the performance with the actress and director Winfried Tobias via Skype.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format from the current Corona situation was born.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was happy about the enrichment of the lessons.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even if at the end all participants agreed that the direct encounter in the theatre and stage space would offer additional stimuli, the theatre also sees the potential for contact with schools.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: If we further improve the technical framework, this could be an interesting addition to the game operation, said director Winfried Tobias.

abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.2: Should TSV 1860 qualify for the DFB-Pokal, the Lions will face Eintracht Frankfurt in the first round.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.3: This resulted in the draw on Sunday.
